mapper.select: select distinct t_module.title as moduleTitle, t_permission.id as permissionId, t_permission.title as permissionTitle, t_permission.permission as permissionPermission, t_permission.module_id as permissionModuleId from t_user, t_user_role, t_role_permission, t_permission, t_module where t_user.id = #{userId} and t_user.id = t_user_role.user_id and t_user_role.role_id = t_role_permission.role_id and t_role_permission.permission_id = t_permission.id and t_permission.module_id = t_module.id

select t_permission.title as permissionTitle, t_permission.id as permissionId, t_permission.permission as permissionPermission from t_module, t_permission where t_module.id = #{id} and t_module.id = t_permission.module_id order by t_permission.id
